[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Adds new features for primitive and tribal playthroughs.
[h1]Workshop ID:[/h1] 1207562628
[h1]Items Added:[/h1] [b]Charcoal:[/b] Made in a charcoal pit. Used as fuel for the grill, smoker, and forge. [b]Grilled Meals: [/b]Come in three varieties: Meat, Veg, and Fine. Provide a small mood bonus, but are slightly more time consuming to make. [b]Curdled Milk: [/b]Milk that has been curdled with vinegar to make cheese. Made at the brewery. [b]Cheese: [/b]A processed food made from milk. Has a good flavor and lasts 21 days before rotting. [b]Smoked Meat:[/b] Like grilled meals, but last for 20 days before rotting. [b]Smoked Cheese:[/b] Like smoked meat, but made of cheese. [b]Turnip:[/b] Yields both turnips and turnip greens. Turnips last for a long time, but the greens don't. [b]Cabbage:[/b] Able to survive and grow in winter temperatures. [b]Prickly Pear:[/b] Fruit from cacti. [b]Turnip Salad:[/b] 5 turnip greens can be combined with 5 vegetables to make a salad. [b]Cabbage Salad:[/b] 5 cabbage can be combined with 5 vegetables to make a salad. [b]Vinegar:[/b] Fermented berries provide a liquid for preserving vegetables. [b]Pickled Vegetables:[/b] By combining vinegar with turnips or cabbage, the food can be preserved to last indefinitely. [b]Shemagh:[/b] A large cloth wrapped around the head which can cover the face when needed. Helps insulate the wearer from the elements. [b]Jute Fiber:[/b] Used to make burlap fabric. [b]Burlap:[/b] A scratchy fabric that can be worn at a cost to mood. [b]Rimshroom:[/b] Rarely spawning mushrooms that are high in protein.
[h1]Objects Added:[/h1] [b]Grill:[/b] Alternative to the campfire for powerless meal production. Can be used to make 2 meals at a time. [b]Shelter Door:[/b] Quick to open, but quick to destroy. Can only be made out of wood. [b]Shelter Wall:[/b] Cheap and quick to build, but quick to destroy. [b]Shelter Heater:[/b] Cheap wood heater that lasts for a night. [b]Charcoal Pit:[/b] A pit dug into the ground for burning wood into charcoal. [b]Smoker:[/b] Stone building that can be used to slowly cook meats and/or cheese, preserving them for a long period of time. [b]Forge:[/b] Allows crafting metal weapons using charcoal. [b]Bellows:[/b] Speeds up the crafting speed of the forge and charcoal pit. [b]Vinegar Barrel:[/b] Allows berries to be fermented into vinegar. [b]Cheese Barrel:[/b] Allows curdled milk to be made into cheese. [b]Camp Table:[/b] A lightweight table for making simple things like a shemagh, salads, or pickles. [b]Camp Butcher Table:[/b] A lightweight table for butchering animals. [b]Snare:[/b] Used as automated hunting, will catch and kill small animals that wander into it.
[h1]Other Features:[/h1] [b]Hardy Plants:[/b] Turnips and Cabbage can be grown in colder temperatures than normal plants.
[h1]Save Compatability[/h1] This mod can be added to existing saves. Always back up your saves before adding new mods as there is always the possibility for issues.
[h1]Mod Compatability[/h1] [b]Medieval Times:[/b] Coal is usable in the Forge, Grilled Meals available at the Stone Hearth, other recipes added to Food Prep Station [b]SeedsPlease:[/b] Seeds added for Turnip, Cabbage, and Jute [b]Zen Garden:[/b] Saguaro Cactus can be grown in an Orchard Zone to produce Prickly Pear; Cherries, Persimmon, and Crabapple can be used to make Vinegar [b]Glowstone:[/b] Forge can be used to weld Glowstones and make Glowstone Tiles. [b]Cupro's Alloys:[/b] Forge/Crucible can be used to make alloys No known issues yet, please report any issues
[h1]Older Versions and Update Notes[/h1] All versions of this mod can be found on my [url=https://github.com/cuproPanda/Survivalists-Additions/releases]GitHub[/url]. Each release has info on what has changed from the previous release.
